result.longName: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited

assetProfile.address2: 18th - 19th Floor No. 2/97-104, Soi Bangna-Trad 25 Bangnanuea, Bangna
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited distributes baby and infant products, and other products in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Distribution of Baby and Infant Products; and Distribution of Other Products. The company offers nipple and bottle products, breastfeeding support products, baby wipes, oral cleaning products, healthcare and hygiene products, cleaning and skin care products, and products for washing and cleaning baby bottles, as well as other baby products under the pigeon brand name; eyebrow and hair care products for children under the Aiaoon brand name; and baby pads under the Softex brand name. It also provides hair and skin care products under the Carebeau brand; cotton wiping and cleaning products, wet wipes, toothbrushes, toothpastes, and whipped foam bath products under the V Care brand; water sprayers under the Foggy and Smile V brand names; toothbrushes under the PROENTAL B and Zenlap & Pharmazen brand names. In addition, the company offers salt lemon and mint candies under the Himalaya Salt brand; herbal drink ready to drink products under the BAO brand name; milk tablets under the Mike Me brand name; diapers, wet wipes, and absorbent pads under the Softex and V Care brands. Further, it operates moong-shop.com, an online store for its products. The company was formerly known as Moong Pattana Marketing Company Limited and changed its name to Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited in August 2008. Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
